films.title: Knights of the Zodiac
films.description: When a goddess of war reincarnates in the body of a young girl, street orphan Seiya discovers that he is destined to protect her and save the world. But only if he can face his own past and become a Knight of the Zodiac.

films.title: The Super Mario Bros. Movie
films.description: The story of The Super Mario Bros. on their journey through the Mushroom Kingdom.

films.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
films.description: Still reeling from the loss of Gamora, Peter Quill rallies his team to defend the universe and one of their own - a mission that could mean the end of the Guardians if not successful.

films.title: Mavka: The Forest Song
films.description: Mavka must choose between love and duty to protect the Heart of the Forest.

films.title: Extraction 2
films.description: After barely surviving his grievous wounds from his mission in Dhaka, Bangladesh, Tyler Rake is back, and his team is ready to take on their next mission.

films.title: The Mistress of the Forest
films.description: To overcome his creative block and pull off an impossible deadline, fledgling comic artist Neil must enter the world of his leading character: the mysterious Mistress Of The Forest.

films.title: Riverdance: The Animated Adventure
films.description: An Irish boy named Keegan and a Spanish girl named Moya journey into the mythical world of the Megaloceros Giganteus who teach them to appreciate Riverdance as a celebration of life.

films.title: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
films.description: Miles Morales catapults across the Multiverse, where he encounters a team of Spider-People charged with protecting its very existence. When the heroes clash on how to handle a new threat, Miles must redefine what it means to be a hero.

films.title: John Wick: Chapter 4
films.description: AJohn Wick uncovers a path to defeating The High Table. But before he can earn his freedom, Wick must face off against a new enemy with powerful alliances across the globe and forces that turn old friends into foes.

films.title: Fast X
films.description: Dom Toretto and his family are targeted by the vengeful son of drug kingpin Hernan Reyes.

films.title: Assassin
films.description: A man dies as part of an experimental military program. A former black-ops soldier takes his place to find who killed him.

films.title: The Best Man
films.description: Mercenaries seize control of a remote resort hotel during a wedding and it's up to the best man, the groom and their drunken best friend to stop the terrorists and save the hostages.

films.title: Nefarious
films.description: On the day of his scheduled execution, a convicted serial killer gets a psychiatric evaluation during which he claims he is a demon, and further claims that before their time is over, the psychiatrist will commit three murders of his own.

films.title: Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania
films.description: Stranded on a crumbling rig in Baja, a family faces off against a vengeful megalodon shark.

films.title: The Black Demon
films.description: Delinquent teen-agers ingest a substance and grow thirty feet tall, then proceed to take over a small town.

films.title: Mummies
films.description: It follows three mummies as they end up in present-day London and embark on a journey in search of an old ring belonging to the Royal Family, stolen by the ambitious archaeologist Lord Carnaby.

films.title: Unseen
films.description: Sam receives a call from Emily a nearly blind woman who is running from her murderous ex in the woods. She must survive the ordeal with Sam being her eyes using video call.

films.title: Jurassic world: Fallen Kingdom
films.description: When the island's dormant volcano begins roaring to life, Owen and Claire mount a campaign to rescue the remaining dinosaurs from this extinction-level event.

films.title: The Tomorrow Job
films.description: A team of thieves use a drug that allows them to trade consciousnesses with their future-selves in order to steal tomorrow's secrets.

films.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
films.description: Sam Witwicky leaves the Autobots behind for a normal life. But when his mind is filled with cryptic symbols, the Decepticons target him and he is dragged back into the Transformers' war.
